publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4434 Robert Brown: The Debt Arrangement Scheme (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2009—That the Justice Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Debt Arrangement Scheme (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2009 (SSI 2009/234).
S3M-4434 The Debt Arrangement Scheme (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2009 (lodged on 17 June 2009) Bill Butler*

S3M-4434 Robert Brown: The Debt Arrangement Scheme (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2009—That the Justice Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Debt Arrangement Scheme (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2009 (SSI 2009/234). Supported by: Bill Butler
